name: Magaricz
author: Karen Cooke
summary: This is my Russian grandmother's version of Italian caponata. Serve with your favorite bread or crackers--we like rye bread!
ingredients: 1  large eggplant, peeled and coarsely chopped
1 medium red bell pepper, cut into thin strips
1  green bell pepper, cut into thin strips
directions: Place eggplant in a colander, lightly salt, and leave to drain for about 45 minutes
Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium high heat
Add eggplant, red and green bell peppers, onion, and carrot; stir to coat
Reduce heat to low, and cook for 40 minutes, stirring occasionally, or until mixture resembles the consistency of coarse jam
Season to taste with salt and red pepper flakes
Cover, and chill at least 1 hour
Serve chilled as a condiment with your favorite bread or crackers
